ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Sludged girdle?
ygData.msgSnippet: Reason i was asking is because i m obsessed with doing the ivandyr s hoop quest (its usually a good investment). In the past i ve gotten 2 others, one of which
ygData.messageBody:
Reason i was asking is because i'm obsessed with doing the ivandyr's hoop
quest (its usually a good investment). In the past i've gotten 2 others, one
of which i sold for 4k + a kylong wrist guard and the other i got a plat
diamond ring for. This time I had 40 rubies, got a hoop on the 8th's ruby.
Traded the hoop to a friend for the girdle.... Now i still had Lynuga up so
i figured i'd keep her and get another hoop. Do NOT try to get 2 out of her
in 1 spawn. I wasted my 32 other rubies on her and didnt get any. So the
moral of the story... I guess i paid 5300pp for the belt. But the original
plan was to get another hoop and sell it to replenish the cost of all those
rubies. Now i dont have enough cash to buy 20 more rubies to get another
hoop *pout*.

You'd be surprised how I've upgraded my equipment by doing that silly
expensive yet very rewarding quest.

Guess its time to empty my good ol necro's bank account and get some more
rubies hehe. I think i'll be keeping the belt after reading up on it. I
dont have a haste belt, I was still using a troll hide belt (which i got on
the first spawn HAHA!)

Minkin
Annoying Ro <-- I still cant spell Annoeeye ro or however its spelled.

-----Original Message-----
From: Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)
[mailto:garramone@...]
Sent: January 10, 2001 6:12 PM
To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Sludged girdle?


doh, i shouldn't have given it to that level 24 bard on the boat in FV for
free =/

Shada

> I payed 8k for mine but that was about 2 months ago. I see them for
> auction often for 2.5-6k. I'd say it's worth 5ish now. *nod*
>
> Ninev
> E'ci
